items.item_details:
Recess to Closed Session
	(Open Session will resume at the end of Closed Session in Cougar Hall at approximately 6:00 p.m.)
	 
	See item 7 on agenda (Closed Session).

items.item_details:
I pledge allegiance
to the flag of the
United States of America
and to the Republic
for which it stands
one nation under God
indivisible with liberty
and justice for all.
